nodes.name: Enter Data in Call Records Table

parameters.subject: Regarding Your Interior Design Inquiry - Interia
parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $json.fields['FirstName'] }},

Thank you for your interest in Interia's interior design services. We've been trying to reach you to discuss your project requirements but haven't been able to connect.
Please feel free to call us back at your convenience or let us know a suitable time when we can reach you.

Warm regards,
The Interia Team

parameters.content: Entry point that receives incoming call event data from an external system.
Creates a record in Airtable's "Call Records" table with call details.
Conditional node that evaluates to true when an end-of-call report is received from the webhook.
Checks if the call was properly connected/answered based on end reason.
Searches Airtable for lead records matching the caller's phone number.
Updates the lead status in Airtable to "Called" after a successful call.
Updates the attempt counter for the lead in Airtable.
Retrieves the lead record from Airtable by searching for the customer's phone number.
Retrieves the lead record when attempts exceed the threshold.
Updates the lead status in Airtable to "Failed" after maximum attempts.
Sets the reason field to "Unreachable" for failed contact attempts.
Updates the lead status in Airtable to "TBC" for further calls.
Checks if the call attempt count is below threshold that is 2
Pauses workflow execution for 60 seconds before making another call attempt.
Makes an API request to Vapi.ai to initiate a follow-up call to the customer.
Sends a simple text email to the lead's email address with a message that someone will contact them soon.

main.node: Enter Data in Call Records Table
